body.p: Nashville, Tennessee, jailer. Tennessee native. Married to Sarah Ann Talley Hobson in Davidson County, Tennessee, on July 6, 1843. Father of Harriet L. Hobson, Elizabeth Hobson, James Hobson, Eva Hobson, John Hobson, Willie Hobson, and Sallie Hobson. Farmer in Davidson County, Tennessee, in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Davidson County in 1850. Jailer in Nashville in 1858. Resident of Nashville in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Nashville in 1860. Jailer in Nashville in 1861.
